name: Dume (serge_rgb)
description:
This is a game for a gamejam at work that happened in April 2020

Move with WASD + Mouse. Shoot with the left mouse button.

The theme was "Lost in Space", so decided to make a game about managing the space between you and the enemy. You heal by being close to the enemy, but you can only shoot when you're putting yourself in the open.

Made with Scruffy, my toy engine

The music was made by my brother for this game jam.

The environment assets are from Quixel Megascans, the worm model is from Turbosquid. Sounds from freesound, then edited with Reaper. Modeling and scene layout in Blender.
